name: Tiles Ultimate
description:
Tiles Ultimate

---- How to play ---------------------------------------------------

Arrow keys to move (or wasd)

Don't touch red squares! Yellow is the warning.

Blue squares can push you with no harming, dark blue is the warning and this box is just annoying.

The square with an arrow can move.

Heart can make you +1 heart, blue square thingy can make you immortal for 10 seconds.

---- Credits ---------------------------------------------------------

Me for code and graphics

Sounds took in the internet

Music Dani Milkman theme song made by Dani

---- Turbowarp ----------------------------------------------------
